title: From Greek Gods to AI: Stephen Fry's Insightful Odyssey
description: British writer-actor Stephen Fry shared insights on the parallels between the fall of Greek gods and the rise of artificial intelligence at the Jaipur Literature Festival. He explored how humanity's creation of AI mirrors Prometheus's creation of mankind, emphasizing the potential consequences of granting AI self-awareness.
content: British writer-actor Stephen Fry captivated audiences at the 19th Jaipur Literature Festival by drawing parallels between the decline of Greek mythology's pantheon and the advent of artificial intelligence. Speaking about his latest book, 'Odyssey,' ... [736 chars]

title: Jeffs’ Brands: KeepZone AI Enters into a Distribution Agreement with Advanced Vehicle and Threat Detection Systems Developer
description: Tel Aviv, Israel, Jan. 16, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Jeffs' Brands Ltd ('Jeffs’ Brands” or the 'Company”) (Nasdaq: JFBR, JFBRW), a data-driven e-commerce company operating on the Amazon Marketplace expanding into the global homeland security sector through advanced artificial intelligence ('AI”)-driven solutions, today announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary, KeepZone AI Inc. ('KeepZone”), has entered into a non-exclusive distribution agreement (the 'Agreement”) with STI Ltd. ('STI”), an Israeli developer of specialized homeland security technologies. The Agreement adds to KeepZone’s growing portfolio of integrated security solutions, with a focus on under-vehicle inspection systems, explosives detection devices, and other advanced threat detection tools.
content: Tel Aviv, Israel, Jan. 16, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Jeffs' Brands Ltd ("Jeffs’ Brands” or the "Company”) (Nasdaq: JFBR, JFBRW), a data-driven e-commerce company operating on the Amazon Marketplace expanding into the global homeland security sector th... [6407 chars]

title: From finance to leadership: How technology is shaping smarter decisions
description: Artificial intelligence is transforming finance and leadership by enabling faster, more informed decisions through advanced data analysis and automation. Professionals must now blend technological insights with human values, ethical judgment, and strategic thinking to navigate complex, data-driven environments. This evolution empowers teams to enhance accuracy, speed, and adaptability, securing a competitive edge.
content:

title: West Bengal to push AI, data centres under Rs 30,000-crore silicon valley project
description: Kolkata, Jan 16 (PTI) West Bengal’s IT sector is poised for a major expansion with investments of around Rs 30,000 crore lined up in the state’s flagship silicon valley project, IT secretary Shubhanjan Das said on Friday, outlining an aggressive push into artificial intelligence, data centres and global capability centres. Addressing an ASSOCHAM-STPI event here, […]
content:
The IT secretary said the state’s technology footprint has expanded beyond Kolkata to centres such as Siliguri and Durgapur.
The state currently has 32 government IT parks and over 60 private IT parks, housing more than 2,800 IT and IT-enabled servic... [2383 chars]

title: Hyundai Motor Group to appoint former head of Tesla’s humanoid robot program as adviser
description: South Korea’s Hyundai Motor Group said on Friday it plans to appoint Milan Kovac, the former head of Tesla’s humanoid robot program, as an adviser as it seeks to bolster its competitiveness in robotics and artificial intelligence.
content:
SEOUL -- South Korea’s Hyundai Motor Group said on Friday it plans to appoint Milan Kovac, the former head of Tesla’s humanoid robot program, as an adviser as it seeks to bolster its competitiveness in robotics and artificial intelligence.

title: Matthew McConaughey Fights AI Scammers by Trademarking His Catchphrase
description: Actor Matthew McConaughey has taken a stand against artificial intelligence by trademarking himself so he has recourse to sue deepfakers.
content:
Actor Matthew McConaughey has taken a stand against artificial intelligence by trademarking himself so he has recourse to sue deepfake makers.

title: LTIMindtree bags Rs 3,000 crore CBDT deal for AI
description: LTIMindtree has secured a Rs 3,000 crore, seven-year contract from the CBDT to upgrade tax analytics using artificial intelligence. The ramp-up in the company’s large-deal wins is expected to aid growth, with brokerages expecting its revenues to rise between 2.2% and 2.4% sequentially in the December quarter.
content:

title: Founders pitch to PM Modi at Startup India event
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met select startup founders at National Startup Day in New Delhi. Entrepreneurs showcased innovations across agritech, cleantech, AI and recruitment. Modi stressed that leadership in artificial intelligence and manufacturing will define India’s economic strength and urged startups to focus on building physical, scalable solutions.
